### Part 2.1
```{r}
library(randomForest)
setwd("./")
df <- read.csv("hotel_bookings.csv", sep = ',',header = T)
df$is_canceled <- as.factor(df$is_canceled)
set.seed(1122)
index <- sample(1:nrow(df), 0.99*dim(df)[1])
train.df <- df[-index,]
test.df <- df[-index,]

train.new.df <- select(train.df, -reservation_status, -country, -agent, -company, -reservation_status_date)
mtry = floor(sqrt(ncol(train.new.df)))

model <- randomForest(is_canceled ~ ., data=train.new.df, mtry=mtry, na.action = na.omit)
pred <- predict(model, test.df, type="class")
confusionMatrix(pred, as.factor(test.df$is_canceled), positive='1')
print(model)
```
